entry.value: select xs.*, (select count(0) from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW g where xs.XSBH = g.GLYWBH and g.GLYWLXDM = '01' and g.XXSC_PDBZ='0') as GLXSS, (select count(0) from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS g where xs.XSBH = g.XSBH and g.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and (g.rwbh != '' or g.rwbh != null)) as GLRWS, (select string_agg(g.ID,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW g where xs.XSBH = g.GLYWBH and g.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' ) as GLYWID, (select case count(*) when 0 then false else true end as statu from (select * from bo_eu_xshb_rw_sb sb,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS gl where sb.rwbh = gl.rwbh and sb.RWZTDM not in('10','04','01','03','11','02') and gl.xsbh = xs.xsbh)v) as XBROLE, (select case count(*) when 0 then true else false end as statu from (select * from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF sb,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS gl where sb.rwbh = gl.rwbh and gl.xsbh = xs.xsbh)v) as XB_HAVEXF from BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs where XXSC_PDBZ = '0'
select sb.* from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB sb where sb.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and sb.XXDJRY_GMSFHM = ?

select distinct on(a.asjbh) a.ASJBH,a.AJMC,a.AJLBDM,a.SLSJ,a.ZATZ_JYQK,a.LARQ,a.ASJFSSJFX_ASJFSKSSJ,a.LADW_GAJGMC,gl.ID,gl.XXZJBH,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,gl.XXDJRY_XM,gl.XXDJRY_GMSFHM,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGMC from TB_ST_ASJ a ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl where a.ASJBH=gl.GLYWBH and a.XXSC_PDBZ ='0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.GLYWLXDM = '02'
select c.cbbh,c.cbmc,gl.ID,gl.XXZJBH from tb_yw_cb c ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl where c.cbbh=gl.GLYWBH and c.XXSC_PDBZ ='0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.GLYWLXDM = '05'

select distinct on(ry.ASJXGRYBH) ry.ASJXGRYBH,ry.XM,ry.CYZJ_ZJHM,ry.HJDZ_XZQHDM,ry.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,ry.DJSJ,gl.id,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,gl.XXDJRY_XM,gl.XXDJRY_GMSFHM,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGMC from tb_st_ry ry ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl where ry.ASJXGRYBH=gl.GLYWBH and ry.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND gl.GLYWLXDM = '04'

select distinct on(a.SAWPBH) a.*,gl.ID,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,gl.XXDJRY_XM,gl.XXDJRY_GMSFHM,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGMC from TB_ST_WP a ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl where a.SAWPBH=gl.GLYWBH and a.XXSC_PDBZ ='0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.GLYWLXDM = '03'

select distinct on(xs.XSBH) xs.XSBH,xs.XSMC,xs.XSLXDM,xs.XSJBDM,xs.SFSMDM,xs.XSMS,xs.DJSJ,gl.ID,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,gl.XXDJRY_XM,gl.XXDJRY_GMSFHM,gl.XXDJDW_GAJGMC from BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl where xs.XSBH=gl.GLYWBH and xs.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND gl.GLYWLXDM = '01'

SELECT ry.ASJXGRYBH,ry.XM,ry.CYZJ_ZJHM,ry.HJDZ_XZQHDM,ry.XXDJDW_GAJGJGDM,ry.DJSJ FROM TB_ST_RY ry WHERE ry.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND ry.ASJXGRYBH not in (SELECT GLYWBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW WHERE GLYWLXDM = '04' #{id}) limit 10000

SELECT a.ASJBH,a.AJMC,a.AJLBDM,a.SLSJ,a.ZATZ_JYQK,a.LARQ,a.ASJFSSJFX_ASJFSKSSJ,a.LADW_GAJGMC FROM TB_ST_ASJ a WHERE XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND a.ASJBH not in (SELECT GLYWBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW WHERE GLYWLXDM = '02' #{id})
SELECT a.* FROM TB_ST_WP a WHERE XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND a.SAWPBH not in (SELECT GLYWBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW WHERE GLYWLXDM = '03' #{id}) limit 10000

select xs.XSBH,xs.XSMC,xs.XSLXDM,xs.XSJBDM,xs.SFSMDM,xs.DJSJ,xs.XSMS,gl.ID from BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs ,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS gl WHERE xs.XSBH = gl.XSBH and xs.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.RWBH = ?
select a.ASJBH,a.AJMC,a.AJLBDM,a.SLSJ,a.ZATZ_JYQK,a.SLSJ,a.LADW_GAJGMC,gl.ID from TB_ST_ASJ a ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl WHERE a.ASJBH = gl.GLYWBH and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.ywbh = ?
select c.cbbh,c.cbmc,c.xxczdw_gajgjgdm,c.xxczdw_gajgmc,c.djsj,gl.ID from TB_YW_CB c ,BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW gl WHERE c.cbbh = gl.GLYWBH and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.ywbh = ?
SELECT U.*,D.DEPARTMENTNAME FROM ORGUSER U INNER JOIN ORGDEPARTMENT D ON U.DEPARTMENTID = D.ID WHERE U.CLOSED = 0 AND U.USERID <> ? and u.DEPARTMENTID = ?
select * from BO_EU_XSHB_FJ where XXSC_PDBZ='0'
select * from tb_yw_ztry where xxsc_pdbz = '0' limit 10

select RWBH,RWMC,'上报' as RWLX,RWZTDM,SBSJ as DJSJ,RWMS,RWJBDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB where XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and RWBH in(select RWBH from bo_eu_xshb_rw_glxs where XSBH=? and rwbh !='') union all select RWBH,RWMC,'下发' as RWLX,RWZTDM,XFSJ as DJSJ,RWMS,JJCDDM as RWJBDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF where XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and RWBH in(select RWBH from bo_eu_xshb_rw_glxs where XSBH=? and rwbh !='')
select xs.* from BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS gl where xs.XSBH = gl.XSBH and xs.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and gl.XXSC_PDBZ = '0'

select sb.*, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1' and lz.JSRY_XM != '') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDXLXDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDXLXDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_GMSFHM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_GMSFHM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.WDRY,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as WDRY, (select distinct QS_pdbz from BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs, BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS glxs where xs.xsbh=glxs.xsbh and sb.SBLXDM ='02' and glxs.rwbh = sb.rwbh and(glxs.rwbh !=null or glxs.rwbh != '' )) as QS_pdbz, (select string_agg(distinct glxs.xsbh,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS glxs where glxs.rwbh=sb.RWBH)as xsbh from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB sb where XXSC_PDBZ = '0'

select xb.*, xs.XSMC,xs.XSBH, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDXLXDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDXLXDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_GMSFHM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_GMSFHM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.LZZTDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xb.XBBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as lz_RWZTDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_xB xb,BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs where 1=1 and xb.XSBH = xs.XSBH

select sb.*, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = sb.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB sb where sb.RWBH in ( select RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB where SBRY_GMSFHM = ? and XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and SFSMDM = '01' union all select RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB where SFSMDM = '01' AND SBRY_GMSFHM <> ? AND XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND SBDW_GAJGJGDM IN (select CODE from CODE_GXS_BIZ where #{queryCode}) )

select xf.*, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDXLXDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDXLXDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM, (select string_agg(distinct glxs.xsbh, ',') from bo_eu_xshb_rw_glxs glxs where glxs.rwbh=xf.rwbh) as xsbh from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF xf where 1=1

select a.* from (select xf.*, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDXLXDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDXLXDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_GMSFHM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_GMSFHM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF xf where XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and RWBH in (select RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and (lz.JSRY_GMSFHM = ? or (lz.JSDXLXDM = '02' and lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM = ?))) ) a where a.RWBH not in (select DISTINCT lz.RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF xf, bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz lz where xf.RWBH=lz.RWBH and lz.SFHT_PDBZ='1' and lz.HTSPSFTG_PDBZ='1' and (lz.HTRY_GMSFHM = ? or (lz.JSDXLXDM = '02' and lz.HTDW_GAJGJGDM = ?)))

select xf.*, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGMC,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGMC, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSRY_XM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSRY_XM, (select string_agg(distinct lz.JSDW_GAJGJGDM,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.RWBH = xf.RWBH and lz.SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1') as JSDW_GAJGJGDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF xf where xf.RWBH in ( select RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF where XFRY_GMSFHM = ? and XXSC_PDBZ = '0' union all select RWBH from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF where SFSMDM = '01' AND XFRY_GMSFHM <> ? AND XXSC_PDBZ = '0' AND XFDW_GAJGJGDM IN (select CODE from CODE_GXS where #{queryCode}) )

with recursive lz as ( select v.* from ( select lz.ID,lz.BINDID,lz.PROCESSDEFID,lz.RWBH,lz.RWLZBH,lz.LZZTDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where 1=1 and (JSRY_GMSFHM = ? or (JSDXLXDM = '02' and JSDW_GAJGJGDM = ?) or XXDJRY_GMSFHM=?) and lz.RWBH = ? order by GXSJ desc ) v limit 1 ) select lz.*,SBRY_XM as BLRY_XM,SBRY_GMSFHM as BLRY_GMSFHM,SBDW_GAJGMC as BLDW_GAJGMC,SBDW_GAJGJGDM as BLDW_GAJGJGDM from lz,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB rw where lz.RWBH = rw.RWBH union all select lz.*,XFRY_XM as BLRY_XM,XFRY_GMSFHM as BLRY_GMSFHM,XFDW_GAJGMC as BLDW_GAJGMC,XFDW_GAJGJGDM as BLDW_GAJGJGDM from lz,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF rw where lz.RWBH = rw.RWBH union all select lz.*,XBDJRY_XM as BLRY_XM,XBDJRY_GMSFHM as BLRY_GMSFHM,XBDJDW_GAJGMC as BLDW_GAJGMC,XBDJDW_GAJGJGDM as BLDW_GAJGJGDM from lz,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_xB rw where lz.RWBH = rw.xbbh

select t.* from ( select v.*,row_number() over(partition by v.ID ) as row_number from ( select lz.ID,lz.BINDID,lz.PROCESSDEFID,lz.RWBH,lz.RWLZBH,lz.LZZTDM, QSRY_XM as BLRY_XM,QSRY_GMSFHM as BLRY_GMSFHM,QSDW_GAJGMC as BLDW_GAJGMC,QSDW_GAJGJGDM as BLDW_GAJGJGDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.SFQS_PDBZ ='1' and SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1' and lz.RWBH = ? union all select lz.ID,lz.BINDID,lz.PROCESSDEFID,lz.RWBH,lz.RWLZBH,lz.LZZTDM, HTRY_XM as BLRY_XM,HTRY_GMSFHM as BLRY_GMSFHM,HTDW_GAJGMC as BLDW_GAJGMC,HTDW_GAJGJGDM as BLDW_GAJGJGDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz where lz.SFHT_PDBZ = '1' and SFZZLZ_PDBZ='1' and lz.RWBH = ? ) v ) t where t.row_number = 1
select a.USERNAME,a.USERID,a.MOBILE,b.ID,b.DEPARTMENTNAME from orguser a,orgdepartment b where a.DEPARTMENTID= b.ID AND a.DEPARTMENTID=?
select * from code_gxs_biz where 1=1
select * from code_gxs where 1=1
SELECT SFFK_PDBZ FROM BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF WHERE RWBH =(SELECT RWBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ WHERE ID=?)
SELECT ID FROM ORGROLE WHERE ROLENAME=?
SELECT STRING_AGG(USERID||'' , ',') FROM ORGUSER WHERE DEPARTMENTID=? AND ROLEID =?
select userid,username from orguser where 1=1
select * from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where XXSC_PDBZ = '0'

with recursive r as ( select * from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where rwlzbh=? union ALL select lz.* from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz , r where lz.PID = r.rwlzbh ) select jl.* from r,BO_EU_XSHB_LCJL jl where r.RWLZBH = jl.RWLZBH and jl.XXSC_PDBZ='0' order by djsj desc

with recursive r as ( select * from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and RWLZBH=? union ALL select lz.* from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ lz , r where lz.PID = r.RWLZBH ) select v.* from ( select jl.*,0 as ROW_NUMBER from r,BO_EU_XSHB_LCJL jl where r.RWLZBH = jl.RWLZBH and jl.DJSJ <=(select GXSJ from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where RWLZBH=?) order by jl.DJSJ ) v union all select v.* from ( select jl.*,row_number() over(PARTITION by jl.RWLZBH order by jl.DJSJ) as ROW_NUMBER from r,BO_EU_XSHB_LCJL jl where r.RWLZBH = jl.RWLZBH and r.PID = ? ) v where ROW_NUMBER = 1
select RWZTDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB where rwbh=? union ALL select RWZTDM from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XF where rwbh=?
SELECT djry from (SELECT rwbh,SBRY_GMSFHM as djry from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_SB union all SELECT rwbh,XFRY_GMSFHM as djry from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_xf) r where r.rwbh=?
select * from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where (qsry_gmsfhm=? or htry_gmsfhm=?) and rwbh=(select rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where rwlzbh=?) order by SFZZLZ_PDBZ DESC
select ID as TASKID,ACTIVITYDEFID as ACTIVITYID, processInstId ,processDefId from WFC_TASK where 1=1

select row_number() over(partition by GJ.SFZH order by GJ.DJSJ DESC) as row_number, ZT.ZTRYBH,ZT.XM,ZT.ZJHM,ZT.HJDZ_DZMC,ZT.XXDJDW_GAJGMC,ZT.DJSJ,GJ.JYSJ from TB_YW_ZTRY ZT left join TB_YW_ZTRY_GJ GJ on ZT.zjhm=GJ.sfzh inner join BO_EU_XSHB_GLTF GL on GL.ZTRYBH = ZT.ZTRYBH where 1=1
select GJ.YHZH,GJ.SHDQDM,GJ.SHDZ,GJ.SHDH,GJ.XM,GJ.ZTRYBH,GJ.JYSJ from TB_YW_ZTRY_GJ GJ where 1=1
select * from BO_EU_XSHB_GLWL where XXSC_PDBZ = '0'
select * from TB_YW_ZTRY_GJ where 1=1
select ry.ZTRYBH,ry.XM,ry.ZJHM,ry.HJDZ_XZQHDM,ry.DJSJ,ry.XXDJDW_GAJGMC,ry.HJDZ_DZMC from TB_YW_ZTRY ry where ry.XXSC_PDBZ = '0' and ry.ZTRYBH not in (select ZTRYBH from BO_EU_XSHB_GLTF where ID =?)
select xs.XSBH,xs.XSMC from BO_EU_XSHB_GLTF tf,BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs where tf.XSBH=xs.XSBH
SELECT string_agg(rwbh,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS where xsbh=(SELECT XSBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS WHERE RWBH =?) AND rwbh !=?
SELECT string_agg(bindid,',') from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ WHERE rwbh in(?) and bindid !=?
SELECT * FROM CODE_XSLY WHERE 1=1
update BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW set ywbh=? where id in('?')
select count(0) from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW where ywbh is not null and ywbh !=''
select id from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_LZ where rwbh=? order by createdate desc
select QSRY_GMSFHM from bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz where rwbh=? and SFZZLZ_PDBZ ='1'
update bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz set SFZZLZ_PDBZ='0',gxsj=(SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) where rwlzbh in (select rwlzbh from bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz where rwbh =? and id !=?)

select xs.xsjbdm,xs.xsmc,xb.xbbh,lz.jsdw_gajgmc,lz.jsry_xm,xs.xsms,xb.xbdjry_xm,xb.xbdjdw_gajgmc,lz.LZZTDM as RWZTDM,xb.djsj from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XB xb,bo_eu_xshb_xs xs,bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz lz where xs.xsbh=(select xsbh from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_XB where xbbh=?) and lz.rwbh=xb.xbbh and xbbh =?
update bo_eu_xshb_glyw set ywbh = ? where XBBH = ? and ywbh = ?
update BO_EU_XSHB_FJ set glywbh = ? where XBBH = ? and glywbh = ?
select id from bo_eu_xshb_rw_lz where rwbh = (select rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS where xsbh =? and (rwbh != '' or rwbh !=null)) and SFZZLZ_PDBZ ='1'

select case count(*) when 0 then false else true end as statu from (select * from bo_eu_xshb_rw_sb sb,BO_EU_XSHB_RW_GLXS gl where sb.rwbh = gl.rwbh and sb.RWZTDM not in('10','04','01') and gl.xsbh =?) v

select a.* from (select distinct on(asj.asjbh) asjbh as bh, xs.xsbh,xs.xslxdm as xslxdm, asj.ajlbdm as ext1, asj.ajmc as mc,asj.asjfssj_asjfskssj as sj,glyw.glywlxdm as ywzldm from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW glyw,BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs,tb_st_asj asj where xs.xsbh = glyw.ywbh and glyw.glywbh = asj.asjbh union all select distinct on(ry.asjxgrybh) asjxgrybh as bh, xs.xsbh, xs.xslxdm as xslxdm, ry.cyzj_zjhm as ext1, ry.xm as mc,ry.djsj as sj,glyw.glywlxdm as ywzldm from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW glyw,BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs,TB_ST_RY ry where xs.xsbh = glyw.ywbh and glyw.glywbh = ry.asjxgrybh union all select distinct on(wp.sawpbh) sawpbh as bh, xs.xsbh, xs.xslxdm as xslxdm, wp.sawp_dmbcms as ext1, wp.wpmc as mc,wp.djsj as sj,glyw.glywlxdm as ywzldm from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW glyw,BO_EU_XSHB_XS xs,TB_ST_WP wp where xs.xsbh = glyw.ywbh and glyw.glywbh = wp.sawpbh ) a where 1=1 and a.bh not in (SELECT GLYWBH FROM BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW WHERE 1=1 #{id})

select '01' as rwlx, rwbh,rwmc,rwms,SBRY_XM as xsrxm,SBRY_GMSFHM as xfrsfzh,SBDW_GAJGJGDM as xfdw,SBSJ as xfsj from bo_eu_xshb_rw_sb where rwbh in( select YWBH as rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW where ywbh like 'R%' and XXZJBH = ? union all select glywbh as rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_FJ where glywbh like 'R%' and XXZJBH = ? ) union all select '02' as rwlx, rwbh,rwmc,rwms,XFRY_XM as xsrxm,XFRY_GMSFHM as xfrsfzh,XFDW_GAJGJGDM as xfdw, XFSJ as xfsj from bo_eu_xshb_rw_xf where rwbh in( select YWBH as rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_GLYW where ywbh like 'R%' and XXZJBH = ? union all select glywbh as rwbh from BO_EU_XSHB_FJ where glywbh like 'R%' and XXZJBH = ? )

select string_agg(us.login_name::varchar,' ') from sys_user us, sys_user_role sr, sys_dept dept, sys_role roler where sr.user_id = us.user_id and dept.dept_id = us.dept_id and roler.role_id = sr.role_id
